column4: can someone please lead me to an idea on how to make flash stop completely deadlocking my kernel :( no logs, tried every ver of flash, tried reinstalling nvidia drivers, chrome, firefox, hardware accel, non accel, cleared .adobe and .macromedia home folders. nothing has helped. flash vid randomly deadlocks entire system and absolutely no log is written to /var/log
I had strange things going on with my machine, couldn't figure it out, replaced video card = fixed.  I guess video card was on its last leg and demonstrating that by freezing the box.
wasnt doing it 2 weeks ago, vid card is rather new
